publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 41
ab.l: Č́eb́ar avaz ḱot́uŕuv́č́uǵa miźmoru David́niń. Sandyr navet́tit́uv́č́ruǵa jarlyny jaman vaḥta julur any H.
H saqlar any da tiri tutar any maḥtalɣan jerd́a da b́ermejdir any kĺagič́a dušmanlarynyn.
H kipĺar any syzlavlu t́oš́agiń- d́ań bar t́oš́agiń č́uv́uŕur ḥastalyɣyndan savluḥqa.

Ḿeń ajttym e
H ḥajifsunɣun ḿeni onɣaltḥyn ǯanymny ki jazyḥly boldum sana.
Dušmanlarym ajtadyrlar ḿenim üč́uń jamanny ajtadoɣon qačaʾn öĺar da taspolur šemi anyn.
Da eǵer keĺśa ḱorḿa savluɣumnu jalɣanny śoźlejdir i- čińd́a yštyradyr avanlyḥny öźuńa čyɣyp tyšḥaryɣa öźǵa t́uś- ĺu śoźlejdir.
Bird́ań üśt́uḿa sybyrdaštylar bar dušmanlarym üśt́uḿa saɣyš et́tiĺar jamanny maja.
Bajdbaḥ śoź qujulɣan an- da daki jatsa arttyrmagej turma.
Daɣy baz eliḿa ki išanyredim anar ašdy öt́ḿagimni olda ulɣajtty üśt́uḿa atlamyn.
Da śeń e H ḥajifsungzn da turɣuzɣun ḿeni da t́oĺajim alarɣa.
Bunun byla bilirmiń ki śuv́d́uj ḿeni ki eǵer bijańmaś dušmanym üśt́uḿa.
Da ḿeń t́uǵaĺligim byla juŕujmiń kipĺagiń ḿeni da turɣuzɣun ḿeni alnyjda dunjaɣa dejiń.
Maḥtavludur H Teńrisi Jiš́raʾeĺniń dunjadan da dunja- ɣa dejiń kerti da qajjam.בָרוךְ יוָי אֱלֹהֵי יִשְרָאֶל מֵהָעוֹלָם וְעַד הָעוֹלָם אָוְ ׃
